name: Realms Of Bondage
description:
Realms Of Bondage is a visual novel game with click-and-point elements.

- Go on sexual adventures in a rich fantasy world, encountering numerous sexy females along the way - many in need of a good spanking.

- Interactive scenes with hand-drawn 2D animations



- Over 40 erotic scenes in the current Early Release - with many more to come!
- Build relationships with key characters



- Relationship outcomes differ depending on how you play the game



- Different choices result in different paths


This game explores themes of:

- BDSM
- Bondage
- Spanking
- Non-consensual sex
- Dom/ Sub
- Slave/ Master relationship
- Relationship Building
